FuncDef: The display qos resource traffic-policy application command displays the number of interfaces to which traffic policies have been bound and the number of remaining interfaces to which traffic policies can be bound.
CLIs: display qos resource traffic-policy application slot <slotid>

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a slot ID. If this parameter is not specified, information about the number of interfaces to which traffic policies have been bound and the number of remaining interfaces to which traffic policies can be bound on all boards is displayed. If this parameter is specified, information about the number of interfaces to which traffic policies have been bound and the number of remaining interfaces to which traffic policies can be bound on the specified board is displayed.
-

Examples: <HUAWEI> display qos resource traffic-policy application slot 1
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To check the number of interfaces to which traffic policies have been bound and the number of remaining interfaces to which traffic policies can be bound, run the display qos resource traffic-policy application command.
